Event Manager Roy the Cat:
Available items by collector level:

Level 0: - *Items for Start - D-Grade Soulshot & Blessed Spiritshot - Greater Haste Potion - Greater Swift Attack Potion - Greater Magic Haste Potion - Quick Healing Potion

Level 1: - *New Items - C-Grade Soulshot & Blessed Spiritshot - Blessed Scroll of Escape - Blessed Scroll of Resurrection - D-Grade Enchant Scrolls (Normal & Blessed)

Level 2: - *New Items - B-Grade Soulshot & Blessed Spiritshot - C-Grade Enchant Scrolls (Normal & Blessed) - B-Grade Enchant Scrolls (Normal & Blessed)

Level 3: - *New Items - A-Grade Soulshot & Blessed Spiritshot - A-Grade Enchant Scrolls (Normal & Blessed) - Red Party Mask

Level 4: - *New Items - S-Grade Soulshot & Blessed Spiritshot - Soul Crystals Stage 11-12 (All Colors) - Giant Codex (Normal) - Attribute Stones (Stone) - Mana Potion - Sealed Majestic Jewels

Level 5: - *New Items - Soul Crystals Stage 13 (All Colors) - S-Grade Enchant Scrolls (Normal) - Attribute Stones (Stone and Crystal) - Giant Codex (Normal and Discipline) - Mana and Combat Haste Potion - Special Recipes for Potions

Level 6: - *New Items - Soul Crystals Stage 14 (All Colors) - S-Grade Blessed Enchant Scrolls - Attribute Stones (All Types) - Giant Codex (All Version) - Special Recipes for Potions

You'll need to raise your collector level to be eligible for some of these items. If you wish to raise your level, go see Winnie the Cat!
